alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 5:56PM CDT until August 05 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi... Northwestern Alcorn County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Hardeman County in west Tennessee... Western McNairy County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Chester County in west Tennessee... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 556 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Pocahontas, or 11 miles southeast of Bolivar, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bolivar, Selmer, Big Hill Pond State Park, Pocahontas, Masseyville, Theo, Robertson, Walnut, Bethel Springs, Middleton, Ramer, Hornsby, Forty Forks, Chalybeate, Rose Creek, Hebron, Chewalla, Rogers Springs, Lisbon and Woodville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
